comments.body: The addition of the `* Extends:` line below is good, but to be honest I'd much prefer if we started adding the `extends ...` in the header line also as a best practice to make the extension more visible.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1278,1282 @@Removes the `listener` from the list of handlers for event `type`.

### Class: `NodeEventTarget`

added: REPLACEME
